Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: From ShoujoMagic: High school senior Aihara Kotoko has had a crush on Irie Naoki since freshman year. But she’s been discouraged from confessing to him by a few things: he’s a member of “Class A,” the top ranking class in school, whereas she’s in “Class F”; he gets the top score on every exam; and he’s so smart, popular, and handsome that he’s been class president every year. When Kotoki finally musters up the courage to present him with a love letter, though, Naoki outright refuses it, telling her point blank–with a look of disgust and boredom–that he doesn’t like “stupid girls.

item.title: Nasama Okima
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
Kyoto Mogami lived solely for her childhood friend Shoutami “Shou” Fuwa. She follows Shou to Tokyo so that he may realize his dream of becoming a famous singer. When his dream is realized, Kyoto overhears the truth behind his decision to bringing her with him: he was using her as a maid. Shocked and enraged,...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: Kyoto Mogami lived solely for her childhood friend Shoutami “Shou” Fuwa. She follows Shou to Tokyo so that he may realize his dream of becoming a famous singer. When his dream is realized, Kyoto overhears the truth behind his decision to bringing her with him: he was using her as a maid. Shocked and enraged, Kyoto swears to take revenge by outdoing him in show business. With a new look and a new attitude, she joins LME, the agency where Ren Tsuruga (Shou’s rival and the #1 actor of LME) works, in the hopes of achieving her goal of destroying Shou’s pride.
